verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>"Command<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H7133>them,<s%> 'My offering, my food for my <S%H7133>offerings<s%> made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H8104>me,<s%> you shall observe to <S%H7126>offer<s%> to me in their due <S%H4150>season.<s%>'

You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H801>them,<s%> 'This is the offering made by fire which you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> day by <S%H3117>day,<s%> for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> at <S%H6153>evening;<s%>

with the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3795>beaten<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

It is a <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> which was <S%H6213>ordained<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Its drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> shall be the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb.<s%> You shall <S%H5258>pour<s%> out a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> of strong <S%H7941>drink<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the holy <S%H6944>place.<s%>

The <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>evening:<s%> as the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and as the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> of <S%H6213>it,<s%> you shall offer <S%H801>it,<s%> an offering made by fire, of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H7676><s%>"'On the Sabbath <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> parts of an ephah of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the drink offering of <S%H5262>it:<s%>
this is the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of every <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the drink offering of <S%H5262>it.<s%>

<S%H7218><s%>"'In the beginnings of your <S%H2320>months<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish;<s%>

and <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth parts of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H6499>bull;<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> parts of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram;<s%>

and a tenth <S%H6241>part<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> to <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb;<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> shall be <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> for a <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> for the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> for a <S%H3532>lamb:<s%> this is the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of every <S%H2320>month<s%> throughout the <S%H2320>months<s%> of the <S%H8141>year.<s%>

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>offered<s%> besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the drink offering of <S%H5930>it.<s%>
<S%H7223><s%>"'In the first <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>month,<s%> is Yahweh's <S%H6453>Passover.<s%>
On the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of this <S%H2320>month<s%> shall be a <S%H2282>feast:<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work;<s%>

but you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>old;<s%> they shall be to you without blemish;

and their meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for a <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for the <S%H352>ram.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> a tenth <S%H6241>part<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs;<s%>
and <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> to make atonement for <S%H3722>you.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> these besides the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> which is for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

In this way you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H3117>daily,<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> the <S%H3899>food<s%> of the offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>offered<s%> besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the drink offering of <S%H5930>it.<s%>
On the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall have a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

<S%H3117><s%>"'Also in the day of the first <S%H1061>fruits,<s%> when you <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in your feast of <S%H7620>weeks,<s%> you shall have a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work;<s%>

but you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> year <S%H8141>old;<s%>

and their meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>parts<s%> for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%>
a tenth <S%H6241>part<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs;<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat,<s%> to make atonement for <S%H3722>you.<s%>

Besides the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the meal <S%H5930>offering<s%> of <S%H6213>it,<s%> you shall offer <S%H8549>them<s%> (they shall be to you without blemish), and their drink <S%H5262>offerings.<s%>
